title: In New Beauty and the Beast Footage, Emma Watson Sings, Meets the Beast, and Yearns in a Field
text:
Go to permalink Image: Beauty and the Beast, Disney 
During the Golden Globes, Disney premiered a short TV spot for Beauty and the Beast. It’s almost all new footage and it’s almost entirely centered on Emma Watson’s Belle. Which makes sense, since it’s soundtracked by her singing “Belle.” Great adventure in the great wide somewhere, indeed. Advertisement 
As is usual for everything we’ve seen from this film, it’s committed hardcore to calling back as much as possible from the animated film. Down to Belle singing her “I Want” song in a field. Take a look:
